title: Carrie's Legacy
description: Em was always a shy, reclusive soul and since early childhood she'd had a powerful connection to the spirit realm.But as Em grows up, her connection moves up a notch. She is constantly plagued by spirits trying to make contact with her. in sheer desperation, her family contact a white witch who teaches Em how to control her gift.When, at 18, she meets Ronnie, the love of her life, things settle down, however this is only temporary and her world is about to be turned upside down once more.Em's family disappear, one by one. She is hellbent on finding them and had to travel the length and breadth of the country on her quest. As she does so, she is helped by all kinds of spirits and Celtic Goddesses.Something else is on a quest and determined to hunt her down. Will she find her missing family? Will her mysterious heritage help her succeed? Find out this and much, much more in this thrilling supernatural mystery.
author: L.W.   King
